ngiemboon: Mɔɔn ée mezíŋ pʉ̀a na nkenkÿo ngẅɛ̀ ndá Ándàm:
en: This is the document containing the family   records  # 5:1 Gn 2:4 of Adam.  # 5:1 Or mankind On the day that God created man,  # 5:1 Or Adam, human beings he made him in the likeness of God;

ngiemboon: À la pwóon mámbàŋa, ḿbwóon manzwě, ńcÿɔʼɔ wɔ́b, ńtóŋo wɔ́b lê pʉ̀a mesoŋ tà fó lyɛʼó.
en: he created them male and female. When they were created, he blessed them and called them mankind.

ngiemboon: Ándàm la gẅiin ngùʼ móm tá nzèm nkÿo, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa á pú sẅé yé tɛʼ, á tsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Sɛd.
en: Adam was 130 years old when he fathered a son in his likeness, according to his image, and named him Seth.

ngiemboon: Ándàm la zyé Sɛd, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ nkÿo lefɔ̌ɔn. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Adam lived 800 years after he fathered Seth, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: Ándàm la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ móm tá nzèm nkÿo lepfwɔʼɔ́.
en: So Adam’s life lasted 930 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Sɛd la gẅiin ngùʼ tʉ̂a nzèm nkÿo, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa, ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Enɔ́shÿè.
en: Seth was 105 years old when he fathered Enosh.

ngiemboon: À la zyé Enɔ́shÿè, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ sɔɔnmbʉ́a nzèm nkÿo lefɔ̌ɔn. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Seth lived 807 years after he fathered Enosh, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: À la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b pʉ́a né legém nzèm nkÿo lepfwɔʼɔ́.
en: So Seth’s life lasted 912 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Enɔ́shÿè la gẅiin ngùʼ móm lepfwɔʼɔ́, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa, ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Kénàŋ.
en: Enosh was 90 years old when he fathered Kenan.

ngiemboon: Enɔ́shÿè la zyé Kénàŋ, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a né legém nzèm nkÿo lefɔ̌ɔn. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Enosh lived 815 years after he fathered Kenan, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: Enɔ́shÿè la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ tʉ̂a nzèm nkÿo lepfwɔʼɔ́.
en: So Enosh’s life lasted 905 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Kénàŋ la gẅiin ngùʼ móm sɔɔnmbʉ́a, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa, ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Malalɛɛ.
en: Kenan was 70 years old when he fathered Mahalalel.

ngiemboon: À la zyé Malalɛɛ, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ móm lekùɔ nzèm nkÿo lefɔ̌ɔn. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Kenan lived 840 years after he fathered Mahalalel, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: À la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ legém nzèm nkÿo lepfwɔʼɔ́.
en: So Kenan’s life lasted 910 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Malalɛɛ la gẅiin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a lé móm ntɔgɔ́, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa, ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Yelɛd.
en: Mahalalel was 65 years old when he fathered Jared.

ngiemboon: À la zyé Yelɛd, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ móm tá nzèm nkÿo lefɔ̌ɔn. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Mahalalel lived 830 years after he fathered Jared, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: À la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a lé móm lepfwɔʼɔ́ nzèm nkÿo lefɔ̌ɔn.
en: So Mahalalel’s life lasted 895 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Yelɛd la gẅiin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b pʉ́a lé móm ntɔgɔ́ nzèm nkÿo, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa, ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Énɔ̀g.
en: Jared was 162 years old when he fathered Enoch.

ngiemboon: À la zyé Énɔ̀g, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ nkÿo lefɔ̌ɔn. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Jared lived 800 years after he fathered Enoch, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: À la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b pʉ́a lé móm ntɔgɔ́ nzèm nkÿo lepfwɔʼɔ́.
en: So Jared’s life lasted 962 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Énɔ̀g la gẅiin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a lé móm ntɔgɔ́, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa, ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Matusalem.
en: Enoch was 65 years old when he fathered Methuselah.

ngiemboon: À la zyé Matusalem, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ nkÿo tá. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě; ḿbiŋ ne ńgiŋe páʼ lepʉ̌ Ssé ne ńzɛ́te.
en: And after he fathered Methuselah, Enoch walked with God   300 years and fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: À la pú ńnéŋe ndùm njÿó ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a lé móm ntɔgɔ́ nzèm nkÿo tá.
en: So Enoch’s life lasted 365 years.

ngiemboon: Ńne ńgiŋe páʼ lepʉ̌ Ssé la ne ńzɛ́te, tà mé gÿo ńcʉ́ʼʉ ńgyá yé wɔ́. Ńtí nue Ssé la tó saʼa yé, ńdɔg ńgʉa ńnéŋe lejʉ́ŋ yé.
en: Enoch walked with God; then he was not there because God took him.

ngiemboon: Matusalem la gẅiin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b sɔɔnmbʉ́a lé móm lefɔ̌ɔn nzèm nkÿo, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa, ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Lemɛg.
en: Methuselah was 187 years old when he fathered Lamech.

ngiemboon: À la zyé Lemɛg, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b pʉ́a lé móm lefɔ̌ɔn nzèm nkÿo sɔɔnmbʉ́a. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Methuselah lived 782 years after he fathered Lamech, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: À la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b lepfwɔʼɔ́ lé móm ntɔgɔ́ nzèm nkÿo lepfwɔʼɔ́.
en: So Methuselah’s life lasted 969 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Lemɛg la gẅiin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b pʉ́a lé móm lefɔ̌ɔn nzèm nkÿo, ńzyé múɔ mbàŋa.
en: Lamech was 182 years old when he fathered a son.

ngiemboon: Ńtsẅi lezíŋ sé lê Nowa. Ńdeen ńké ńgɔɔn ngie: «Wɔɔn ŋwɛ́, aa gẅie à ge láʼ tóonte wég na mefàʼ még; ńtí ngɔ́ʼ gie peg gyá na tsetsáʼ gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la néŋ ndòon mǒ.»
en: And he named him Noah,   saying, “This one will bring us relief from the agonizing labor of our hands, caused by the ground the Lord has cursed.”  # 5:29 Gn 3:17–19; 4:11

ngiemboon: Lemɛg la zyé Nowa, ńgíŋe ńtsẅé ndùm njÿó ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b tʉ̂a lé móm lepfwɔʼɔ́ nzèm nkÿo tʉ̂a. Ńgwaa tsẅé púʼu, ńgíŋe ńzyé tsɔ́ púɔ mbàŋa mbɔɔ púɔ panzwě.
en: Lamech lived 595 years after he fathered Noah, and he fathered other sons and daughters.

ngiemboon: À la gwaa kwé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ ntsɔ̀b sɔɔnmbʉ́a lé móm sɔɔnmbʉ́a nzèm nkÿo sɔɔnmbʉ́a.
en: So Lamech’s life lasted 777 years; then he died.

ngiemboon: Nowa la gwaa zyete lézyé, mbà à gẅǐin ngùʼ nkÿo tʉ̂a. À la zyé Sɛm, ńzyé Shÿâm ńzyé Yafɛd.
en: Noah was 500 years old, and he fathered Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
